pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, April 30, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, April 30, 2017:

Toronto, Ontario 

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Ontario Sikh and Gurdwara Council Khalsa Day celebrations.

Nathan Philips Square
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.
  • Media should gather at stage location for coverage of Prime Ministerâ€™s participation
